tweet: The founding fathers must be spinning in their graves. Let's wrap them in copper wire, connect a magnet, and harness the energy they create.
I didn't hit a single red light on my way into work today. I think this may turn out to be a good day.
Looks like I can get free Jazz tickets since the Billy Joel/Elton John concert had to be rescheduled.  That does not suck.
If I was king, I would rule with an iron fist. Since I'm not king, I have to rule over things with an aluminum foil fist.
